layout: post title: On This Blog dateline: 2020 Sept. 13

Hi.

This is my blog.

I’m not entirely sure yet what I’ll be using it for, but it stands as a space for me to catalogue my thoughts that aren’t strictly related to any of the other categories presented on this website. Perhaps I’ll talk about politics or video games or whatever else here. Time will tell.
